trans-unit.source: Contains detailed information about input that was recognized by instances of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关由 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 实例识别的输入的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: This class derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> and provides detailed information about speech recognition, including the following:
trans-unit.target: 此类派生自<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>并提供有关语音识别，包括以下详细的信息：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Grammar%2A> property references the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> that the recognizer used to identify the speech.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Grammar%2A>属性引用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>识别器用于标识语音。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Text%2A> property contains the normalized text for the phrase.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Text%2A>属性包含短语的规范化的文本。

trans-unit.source: For more information about text normalization, see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText>.
trans-unit.target: 有关文本规范化的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.ReplacementText>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A> property references the semantic information contained in the result.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A>属性引用包含在结果中的语义信息。

trans-unit.source: The semantic information is a dictionary of the key names and associated semantic data.
trans-unit.target: 语义信息是密钥名称和关联的语义数据的字典。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property contains a collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> objects that represent other candidate interpretations of the audio input.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>属性包含一套<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>表示音频的输入其他候选解释的对象。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> for additional information.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Words%2A> property contains an ordered collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> objects that represent each recognized word in the input.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Words%2A>属性包含的有序的集合<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>表示每个对象识别输入中的单词。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit> contains display format, lexical format, and pronunciation information for the corresponding word.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedWordUnit>包含显示格式、 词法格式和相应的单词的发音信息。

trans-unit.source: Certain members of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> classes can generate a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: 某些成员<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>类可以生成<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the following methods and events.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅以下的方法和事件。

trans-unit.source: Methods and events of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> class:
trans-unit.target: 方法和事件的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>类：

trans-unit.source: Methods and events of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> class:
trans-unit.target: 方法和事件的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>类：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>事件<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>类。

trans-unit.source: For more information about recognition events, see [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: 有关识别事件的详细信息，请参阅[使用语音识别事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a handler for the `SpeechRecognized` event of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object, and some of the information about the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的处理程序`SpeechRecognized`事件<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>对象，以及有关关联的信息的一些<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of possible matches for input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 获取可能的匹配集合，以便输入至语音识别器。

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of the recognition alternates.
trans-unit.target: 识别备用项的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Recognition <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> are ordered by the values of their <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 识别<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>排序的值及其<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The confidence value of a given phrase indicates the probability that the phrase matches the input.
trans-unit.target: 给定的短语的置信度值指示短语的输入匹配的概率。

trans-unit.source: The phrase with the highest confidence value is the phrase that most likely matches the input.
trans-unit.target: 使用最高置信度值短语是最有可能的输入匹配的短语。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> value should be evaluated individually and without reference to the confidence values of other <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>单独和无需对其他的置信度值引用还应评估价值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The properties that the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> inherits from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> provide detailed information about the phrase with the highest confidence score.
trans-unit.target: 属性的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>继承自<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>短语有关的详细的信息提供最高置信度得分。

trans-unit.source: One use for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> collection is for automated error correction.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>集合是为自动的错误更正。

trans-unit.source: For example, when designing a directory dialog, an application could prompt the user to check if the application has the correct information from a recognition event, as in, "Did you say 'Anna'?" If the user says "no", then the application could query the user about any alternates that had a high enough <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> score.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在设计目录对话框时，应用程序可能提示用户以检查是否应用程序中，从识别事件，正确的信息"，您是否 Anna？"如果用户显示"否"，则应用程序无法查询有关任何备用项具有足够高的用户<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>分数。

trans-unit.source: For more information about speech recognition and the use of recognition alternates, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Using Speech Recognition Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482).
trans-unit.target: 有关语音识别和使用情况将识别备用项的详细信息，请参阅[语音识别](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)和[使用语音识别事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01c598ca-2e0e-4e89-b303-cd1cef9e8482)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a handler for the `SpeechRecognized` event and some of the information about the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的处理程序`SpeechRecognized`事件和有关关联的信息的一些<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the audio associated with the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: 获取与识别结果关联的音频。

trans-unit.source: The audio associated with the recognition result or <see langword="null" /> if the recognizer generated the result from a call to the <see langword="EmulateRecognize" /> or <see langword="EmulateRecognizeAsync" /> methods of a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果识别器从启动调用的结果 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 实例的 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see langword="EmulateRecognize" /> 方法，音频与标识结果或 <see langword="EmulateRecognizeAsync" /> 。

trans-unit.source: To get a section of the audio that is associated with a specific range of words in the recognition result, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的特定范围的识别结果中的单词与相关联的音频部分，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.GetAudioForWordRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a handler for the **SpeechRecognized** event and some of the information about the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的处理程序**SpeechRecognized**事件和有关关联的信息的一些<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>。

trans-unit.source: The first word in the range.
trans-unit.target: 所表示范围中的第一个字。

trans-unit.source: The last word in the range.
trans-unit.target: 所表示范围中的最后一个日期。

trans-unit.source: Gets a section of the audio that is associated with a specific range of words in the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: 在识别结果中获取与特定范围单词关联的音频部分。

trans-unit.source: The section of audio associated with the word range.
trans-unit.target: 与字范围关联的音频的部分。

trans-unit.source: To get the complete audio associated with the recognition result, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取与识别结果关联的完整音频，使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Audio%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar to accept name input and attaches to it a handler for the `SpeechRecognized` event.
trans-unit.target: 以下示例创建语法能够接受名称输入，并将处理程序附加到它`SpeechRecognized`事件。

trans-unit.source: The grammar uses a wildcard for the name element of the phrase.
trans-unit.target: 语法短语的名称元素使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: The event handler uses the audio from the wildcard to create and play a greeting prompt.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序使用的音频从通配符来创建和播放问候语提示符。

trans-unit.source: The recognizer generated the result from a call to <see langword="EmulateRecognize" /> or <see langword="EmulateRecognizeAsync" /> methods of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 从启动调用的结果生成的识别器 <see langword="EmulateRecognize" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine" /> 对象的 <see langword="EmulateRecognizeAsync" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: 要填充数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: 此序列化的目标。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> instance with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化目标对象所需的数据填充 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> 接口时使用。
